channel.title: Grading on Yuvi Panda
channel.description: Recent content in Grading on Yuvi Panda

item.title: Personal Auto Grading Roadmap
item.description: I’m doing a bunch of autograding work in the Jupyter ecosystem. I’ve little direct experience in this vast area, which makes building good systems for it hard. When I have explicit users with specific use cases to meet, it always becomes easier. This blog post is an attempt to: Explain the use cases & users I need to serve Describe the components I am working on As usual, I am attempting to build these within the larger Jupyter community in ways everyone can use, rather than just the amazing folks at Berkeley.
